Key Match Events: Dyson Daniels hit a 3-pointer on Sunday night and appeared to make a gun gesture toward the Pelicans' bench.
Post-Match Reflections: Daniels said he was 'just telling them all that it was worth 3 points' and that he was 'just out there having fun'.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The NBA has fined players for similar gestures in the past, including Josh Jackson, who received a $35,000 fine in 2017 for making a'menacing gesture' on the court.
Daniels had 16 points and five rebounds in the Hawks' win on Sunday night and is averaging a career-high 13.4 points and 4.4 rebounds per game this season.
Others: The Hawks will host the Boston Celtics next on Monday night.
